reference.title: euca-describe-image-attribute
reference.shortdesc: Show an image attribute. You can get information about only one attribute per request.

row.entry: Unique identifier for the image that you want to retrieve the attributes for
Describes the launch permissions of the image
Describes the product code associated with the image
Describes mapping that defines device names to use when exposing virtual devices.
Describe the kernel ID the image will be launched with
Describe the RAM disk ID the image will be launched No with.
